channel.title: No servers will work - and server status page is not workin either
channel.description: Hi , my name is tobias , i have been addicted to a game called [i]lawscape[/i] for ages , i had ful dragon etc , but lets get to the point , since last week the server status page is not working , my old forum account freindlyman9 , cannot log in anymore , ANY server apart from loacal appears DOWN (what does a server being down mean???) I would love to play on private servers again please please help! :)

item.description:
@t3h_0wn4g3 wrote:

when it says the server is down,
it is:
offline or updating.
if it says it is full, …it is full…
if you don’t have hamachi and your trying to get on a hamachi server, there is no point.
